vehicles.description: A white van is located directly in front of our vehicle on the same lane, and judging from the illuminated red taillights, it seems to be braking.
vehicles.explanation: The position of the truck may indicate that it is in the process of making a temporary delivery or pickup, requiring the vehicle to be ready to slow down or change lanes as necessary to maintain traffic flow and safety.

traffic lights.description: There is a green traffic light on the right side of the intersection ahead.
traffic lights.explanation: The green light indicates that this vehicle may proceed, but attention must be paid to the changing phases of the traffic lights when approaching an intersection.

other objects.description: On the right side of the road, there are rows of colorful garbage bins.
other objects.explanation: Although these objects are currently not on the road, they should be monitored to see whether they may pose an obstacle or move, which could affect road conditions or necessitate a detour for our vehicle.

general_perception.description and explanation:
In the image, there is a white van directly in front of our vehicle in the same lane, which appears to be braking as indicated by its illuminated red taillights. This suggests that the van may be making a temporary delivery or pickup, requiring our vehicle to be prepared to slow down or change lanes to maintain traffic flow and safety.

Ahead, on the right side of the intersection, there is a green traffic light. This green light indicates that our vehicle can proceed but should remain attentive to the traffic light phases when approaching the intersection.

Additionally, there are rows of colorful garbage bins on the right side of the road. These objects are currently not on the road but should be monitored in case they pose an obstacle or move, which could affect road conditions or necessitate a detour for our vehicle.

driving_suggestion: Maintain a safe following distance from the van ahead. Proceed cautiously at intersections, obeying green light signals while paying attention to other road users and potential changes. Watch out for the trash cans on the right, looking for any signs of spillage on the road to prepare for evasive actions.

1.description and explanation: This object is a dustbin, typically used for the disposal of waste materials. Positioned near the edge of the roadway, its presence indicates that drivers should remain mindful to maintain a safe distance when passing by to avoid collisions. Additionally, the area near the dustbin may be frequented by pedestrians or service vehicles attending to waste management, prompting drivers to exercise caution and potentially slow down when in the vicinity.
